item.title: Wrong code. [ 317 ] [ Delta ] [ Rep++ ]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Who ever solves this , gets Rep++.

Code:

[code=cmf]if ((NPCID < server.npcHandler.npcs.length) && (NPCID > 0)) {
if(NPCID == 2633 && donator == 1){
specialAmount = 100;
lowGFX(437, 0);
specAttack();
sM(“You’ve restored your special attack”);
} else {
sM(“You must be a Donator to use this feature.”);
} else if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 300000) {
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
sM(“You can only use it every 5 minutes!”);
}
}
}

		break;[/code]

Error:

client.java:11159: 'else' without 'if' } else if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 300000) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

This is the second way I tried to do it:

if ((NPCID < server.npcHandler.npcs.length) && (NPCID > 0)) { if (NPCID == 2633 && donator == 1){ if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 300000) { lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specialAmount = 100; lowGFX(437, 0); specAttack(); sM("You've restored your special attack"); } else { sM("You must be a Donator to use this feature."); } else { sM("You can only use it every 5 minutes!"); } } } } break;

Error:

'else' without 'if'
